name: A cat for Xmas (My lucky cat)
name_original: A cat for Xmas (My lucky cat)
description:
A cat For Xmas 

After the event of a year ago, Cayden has tried to end his life several times but magically something strange and pathetic happens and prevents him from achieving it, so he decides to travel to a distant town quite far from the city. In the town there was a small temple under reconstruction, so he decides to make a wish before dying, he is not really a believer in anything but at this point, the only thing he wants is to die!.. but of course something strange happens again, possibly the strangest thing of all.

This is a mini demo of my visual novel (My lucky cat) this demo (cuz I need more time to finish the novel :,,) is based on the Chapter 1 of the novel where the protagonist is Cayden. The original story has a bit of comedy, drama and romance. It contains two romantic routes and three endings of the protagonist Abby, where you can follow not only her story, but also Cayden, Kuro, Haru, and many other characters that will appear as you progress, don't miss the opportunity to follow this incredible story.

 The game isn't finished! I will be updating the sprites, the gui and adding other animations. This is my first time using Ren'py (sorry for the bugs:,,,) This chapter is kinematic. 

Anyone who wishes to play this VN, please know that it contains some mentions of suicide, depression in the begging.  

Art, Writing & Coding: 

by Ryue (ryuedoc)

  •     Placid ambient by Musiclfiles (Filmmusic.io)
  • Reflections by Alexander Nakarada (Filmmusic.io)
  • Ruins of town by Winniethemoog (Filmmusic.io)
  • Tutorial4 by Frank Schroeter (Filmmusic.io)

Created with the Renpy 8.0.3

I will be updating the game periodically until I finish it!

Spanish version soon!
